## newSession() function

Expires current session and starts a new session.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function newSession(trackers?: Array<string>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  trackers | Array&lt;string&gt; | The tracker identifiers which will have their session refreshed |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
